title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, list models, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for chatting with local Ollama models (self-hosted).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experiment to turn Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot-style coding assistant for VS Code.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama supporting chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial .NET SDK for Ollama with async/await and streaming support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose examples for running Ollama containerized with GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama supporting threads and app mentions.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models inside the editor for code explanation or generation.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama endpoints with admin UI and API throttling.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template that proxies and extends Ollama with JWT auth and usage quotas.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Starter repo for building RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes via Ollama.
